attributes.review: This app would constantly crash my phone, even when I wasn’t using it. I could be scrolling through Twitter and my phone would just shut down for a few minutes. I will not be returning to this app
attributes.title: Broken app

attributes.review: i was SO excited to finally‼️download my TRUMP 2020 🇺🇸APP! however 🤔 as soon as i opened up MR TRUMPS wonderful beautiful huge app, his P*NIS 💥😫🍆 WAS ON MY SCREEN!! 🤢I tried to close 🙅🏽‍♂️it, but I got a text from the ✨orange✨he was BEGGING🥺me to vote for him, and if i didn’t the app would NEVER close! now i am STUCK with the TEENSY WEENSY TRUMPY WUMPY BUNKER BABY 🍆 on my phone 😡😤terrible app i bet Bernie Sanders has a better one ACAB BLM VOTE BLUE
attributes.title: orange 🍊

attributes.review: i wanted to download this app to be further educated on my country. But was shown so much nonsense and ignorance. It also took forever to download and when i opened it i saw a very traumatizing face. I didn't know they were going to have jump scares. Do not download this app for your own safety.
attributes.title: trauma

attributes.review: literally never ever in my life have i used a worse app than this one. not only does the color scheme put me in a horrible mental state but also i feel like they’re definitely sending my information to the Chinese government which i am NOT cool with 😡.
attributes.title: this app is ✨🦋terrible✨🦋

attributes.review: Why does it take so long to download this took over 60 years to download I’m very disappointed and not to mention that it’s hard to look at this app without making my eyes bleed 0 but unfortunately I’m forced to give this app one star
attributes.title: Just why

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it froze my phone honestly I was scared it broke my phone for a while I had to turn my phone off then back on again any time I tried to open it it would do it again so safe to say I deleted it
attributes.title: Don’t download

attributes.review: I purchased this app to find valuable u formation about our president but the only thing in the screen was a little man with a hard hat on saying “we are working on this site”. Why put out an app when the site is still under construction?
attributes.userName: umm has anyone seen my dog

attributes.review: This app is literally the worst app I tried deleting it but it wouldn’t let me I kept making my phone glitch out after I got the app and that’s only the beginning the app it’s self is awful bc trump is the worst president we have ever had not to mention he is literally a orange

attributes.review: When I open the app my phone completely glitches then it stopped a half hour later so I when back in and there was an orange 🍊 an orange that looks like a man with its 1inch wiener that looks like a Cheeto even my grandma almost died 🌚 this is absolutely trash likeee no❤️
attributes.title: This is a horrible app 🤮

attributes.review: So when I downloaded the app I had high hopes to see our best presidents plans but immediately as I open the app it asked for my phone number. It made me feel a little uncomfortable and unsafe cuz you got me f’d up if you think I’m gonna give my info to some orange and his team.
attributes.title: Awful App
